virtual FDO_API void FdoICreateMeasureUnit::SetBaseUnit ( FdoBaseUnit  value  )  [pure virtual]

Sets the base units that define the measure unit to create or update as an FdoBaseUnit value.

Parameters:

Returns:
Returns nothing
